properties.description: Your given name for the object you're depositing.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Author or Authors (use the button at right to add more). Please follow the convention "Lastname, Given Names."
properties.title: Author

properties.description: People who aren't considered authors, but still contributed to the work. Please follow the same convention.
properties.title: Other Contributor

properties.description: Select a copyright license. Note that this does not directly affect embargo or permissions to view your research, which can be changed later. While you always retain ownership of any content deposited into SFU's Research Data Repository, by selecting a license for your content you hereby grant stewardship of the content to Simon Fraser University Library under terms which can be viewed from here.

options.index: Creative Commons Zero -- waive all rights and place work in public domain.
Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 -- allows free use with attribution.
Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 (CC BY) -- allows others to make derivative works.
Do not apply a Creative Commons license; deposited object remains proprietary

properties.title: Rights / Licensing

properties.description: The agency or agencies who provided funds to support this work.
properties.title: Funding Agency

properties.description: The date on which the data or other research object was created or published.<hr/>
properties.title: Production Date

properties.description: If a particular software platform was needed to produce and/or view this data, please list it here.
properties.title: Software

properties.description: Keywords that describe the object (one per textfield, use the button at right to add more).
properties.title: Keywords

properties.description: The academic discipline that the work belongs to
properties.title: Discipline

properties.description: Geographic coverage of the object, if relevant.
properties.title: Geographic Coverage

properties.description: Type of data included in the file, in plain language (e.g. survey data, aggregate data, GIS data)
properties.title: Data Type

properties.description: Method used to create research object (e.g. survey, laboratory tool output, etc.)<hr/>
properties.title: Collection Method

properties.description: Description of sources used in creation of research object (e.g. population surveyed)
properties.title: Sources

properties.default_value: None required for research not involving human subjects
properties.description: How was confidentiality obtained for research involving human subjects?
properties.title: Confidentiality Declaration

properties.description: Any clarifying information about the nature of the object itself (e.g. data formatting standards, etc.)<hr/>
properties.title: Format Description

properties.description: Please provide links to any relevant accompanying materials (e.g. the research article that data accompanies).
properties.title: Related published content
